mapper.insert:
insert into api_hab_gameinfo
playerid,
brandid,
username,
brandgameid,
gamekeyname,
gametypeid,
dtstarted,
dtcompleted,
friendlygameinstanceid,
gameinstanceid,
stake,
payout,
jackpotwin,
jackpotcontribution,
currencycode,
channeltypeid,
createtime,
bettime,
betmoney,
netmoney
#{playerid},
#{brandid},
#{username},
#{brandgameid},
#{gamekeyname},
#{gametypeid},
#{dtstarted},
#{dtcompleted},
#{friendlygameinstanceid},
#{gameinstanceid},
#{stake},
#{payout},
#{jackpotwin},
#{jackpotcontribution},
#{currencycode},
#{channeltypeid},
#{createtime},
#{bettime},
#{betmoney},
#{netmoney}
mapper.update:
update api_hab_gameinfo
brandid=#{brandid},
username=#{username},
brandgameid=#{brandgameid},
gamekeyname=#{gamekeyname},
gametypeid=#{gametypeid},
dtstarted=#{dtstarted},
dtcompleted=#{dtcompleted},
friendlygameinstanceid=#{friendlygameinstanceid},
gameinstanceid=#{gameinstanceid},
stake=#{stake},
payout=#{payout},
jackpotwin=#{jackpotwin},
jackpotcontribution=#{jackpotcontribution},
currencycode=#{currencycode},
channeltypeid=#{channeltypeid},
createtime=#{createtime},
bettime=#{bettime},
betmoney=#{betmoney},
netmoney=#{netmoney}
where playerid=#{playerid}
mapper.select: select * from api_hab_gameinfo a where a.playerid=#{key}
